data.name: Approach.Text
data.value: Describe the innovation of your solution or product

data.name: ApproachDesc.Text
data.value:
Showcase the uniqueness of your Solution or product. Highlight the characteristics that may attract partners, clients, or investors.
Try to address these questions as you describe the Solution or product:
  • Are you highlighting the innovation and unique character?
  • Is Solution or product related with the problem?
  • Is the Solution or product actionable, practical?
  • Is the innovation actionable, practical?
  • Is the Solution or product replicable, scalable?

data.name: AvailableResourcesDesc.Text
data.value: Please tick all resources that are readily available for the implementation of your Solution, or for the transfer of knowledge. This really enhances the description and shows the effort undertaken to develop resources for scale and replication.

data.name: Beneficiaries.Text
data.value: Beneficiaries

data.name: BeneficiariesDesc.Text
data.value: Identify the end-consumer or beneficiary of your Solution or product. Beneficiaries can be individuals, organizations or groups.

data.name: BlockAdditionalInformationDesc.Text
data.value: More specific information about the Solution

data.name: BlockBenefits.Text
data.value: Impact

data.name: BlockBenefitsDesc.Text
data.value: Describe qualitatively and quantitatively the impact of your Solution or product. Emphasize the reach of this impact and how it is sustainable over time.

data.name: BlockDetails.Text
data.value: Implementation

data.name: BlockDetailsDesc.Text
data.value: This section briefly describes the next steps and activities that you plan to develop to position your Solution or product in the market and expand its impact. Describes the activities that have been done so far to implement your solution or product and what are the new proposed activities to grow or reach th next phase. Include information on the budget and the time associated with this implementation. How you much have you budgeted for these activities? How long will it take to implement?

data.name: BlockDurationDetailsDesc.Text
data.value: sdf sd ff dsfdsfsdfsd f sdf sdf sdfsdf sdf sdf sdf sdfsd ds fsd

data.name: BlockEvidences.Text
data.value: Evidence

data.name: BlockEvidencesDesc.Text
data.value: Has your solution been tested by clients or users? For how long? Do you have more information and documents? Share them there.

data.name: BlockFinish.Text
data.value: Preview

data.name: BlockFinishDesc.Text
data.value: A peek at how NEXSO presents your solution or product before you hit Send

data.name: BlockInnovation.Text
data.value: Innovation

data.name: BlockInnovationDesc.Text
data.value: This is the key section! Put your marketing skills to work here. Demonstrate how your Solution or product is innovative and unique. Explain how you made a difference in addressing the problem described.

data.name: BlockOrganizationBasicDetailsDesc.Text
data.value: Organization information. Create a new one or search for an existing one.

data.name: BlockProblem.Text
data.value: Problem

data.name: BlockProblemDesc.Text
data.value: Describe the problem or market need that your Solution or product seeks to address. It should be a very specific problem, not a macro global issue like "climate change"or "poverty".

data.name: BlockTitle.Text
data.value: Name your Solution or product

data.name: BlockTitleDesc.Text
data.value: </br>

data.name: Challenge.Text
data.value: Problem

data.name: ChallengeDesc.Text
data.value:
Try to address these questions as you describe the problem:
  • What is the current situation of the beneficiary or consumer that you try to support with this Solution or product?
  • What is the context of the problem and the actual situation of the people affected?
  • What obstacle is that beneficiary or consumer facing?
  • What causes this problem you are describing?
  • What is the size or magnitude of this problem? Numbers are welcome.
  • Who are the affected people from this problem?

data.name: CostDesc.Text
data.value: In this section you must give an estimated budget for the consolidation and and posititioning of your Solution or product in the market.

data.name: CostDetails.Text
data.value: Budget details

data.name: CostDetailsDesc.Text
data.value:
Use this space to describe additional cost considerations, including the number of units, travel, materials, and so on. Try to separate the fixed and variable costs.
Keep in mind other cost factors including travel, licensing fees, legal work, hosting and other online services for web projects, and materials.

data.name: CostValue.Text
data.value: Estimated budget (in USD)

data.name: DeliveryFormat.Text
data.value: Type of Solution or product

data.name: DeliveryFormatDesc.Text
data.value: Please select the type that best describes how your Solution or product will be delivered.

data.name: DurationDetails.Text
data.value: Duration Details

data.name: DurationDetailsDesc.Text
data.value: Investors and potential customers need an idea of ​​the time required to achieve these objectives. Think about how these times are related with the activities mentioned earlier.

data.name: Finish.Text
data.value: Send solution or product

data.name: ImplementationDetails.Text
data.value: Implementation Details

data.name: ImplementationDetailsDesc.Text
data.value: Briefly describe the sequence of activities and details needed for the consolidation of your business model and market positioning. This information is very important for the potential investor can understand what is required and can associate the costs and time needed for the implementation.

data.name: LongDescriptionDesc.Text
data.value:
Here's an extra opportunity for you to pitch your Solution!
Use this additional space to share any additional information you have about your Solution. Get into more details here, or elaborate on a particular area. You might use this section to add more history of your Solution or to demonstrate credentials relevant to potential adopters. Please do not repeat yourself here.

data.name: MailTemplateNewSolution.Text
data.value:
update your profile - www.nexso.org
{SOLUTION:Title}
Congratulations, {USER:FirstName}. We see you started a new Solution on NEXSO. Here's a short guide to show you everything you need to complete in order to see your Solution submitted.

Everything You Need To Get Your Solution Submitted Successfully

1. Start Here
The title, the value proposition, the organization.

2. Problem
Describe the particular development problem that your Solution seeks to alleviate.

3. Innovation
Demonstrate how your Solution is innovative, how it makes a difference, and how it addresses the specific challenge you described.

4. Impact
Explain the results and effects a potential Solution adopter can expect from implementing your Solution.

5. Details
Any specific points of interest someone would need to know about implementation in order to evaluate the Solution and its replication potential.

6. Evidence
More information that can convince potential adopters to connect with your Solution.

7. Additional Information
Provide more information to complement your Solution.

8. Finish
Submit your Solution.
For further support on how to submit a Solution please visit our help page.
Edit your Solution
Inter-American Development Bank
Multilateral Investment Fund
1300 New York Ave NW, Washington, DC 20577, USA

data.name: MailTemplateNewSolutionSubject.Text
data.value: {USER:FirstName} Make sure you turn your draft into a submitted Solution!

data.name: MailTemplatePublishedSolution.Text
data.value:
update your profile - www.nexso.org

Dear {USER:FirstName},

Thank you for submitting your application via NEXSO to the Call for startups, Demand Solutions for Improving Lives in Cities 2015.

Your application to be considered amongst the most innovative startups of Latin America and the Caribbean has been received and it will be evaluated in the following weeks. Selected startups will be notified mid-August.

View my Solution

Thank you,

Demand Solutions
www.iadb.org/demandsolutions
Inter-American Development Bank
Multilateral Investment Fund
1300 New York Ave NW, Washington, DC 20577, USA

data.name: MailTemplatePublishedSolutionSubject.Text
data.value: {USER:FirstName}, Congratulations Your Solution is now eligible to participate in NEXSO opportunities!

data.name: OrganizationAttached.Text
data.value: Organization

data.name: OrganizationAttachedDesc.Text
data.value: Select an Organization from the List or Type an Organization Name for creating a new one. The organization is the name of your startup. For example: ieetech is the startup the makes Chipsafer. If your startup is your product, create the profile of the organization based on your product.

data.name: ProjectDuration.Text
data.value: Duration

data.name: ProjectDurationDesc.Text
data.value: Indicate how long you it takes the consolidation and positioning of your solution or product in this new phase.

data.name: Results.Text
data.value: Impact of your solution or product

data.name: ResultsDesc.Text
data.value:
Try to answer these questions as you describe the impact of your Solution or product:
  • How do you quantify (using numbers) the impact of your Solution or product?
  • What is the potential scale or dimension of your Solution or product?
  • What is your business model? Briefly explain how your Solution or product can generate income and be sustainable.
  • Have you included figures to support the impact description and show evidence of the success of your Solution or product?

data.name: ShortDescription.Text
data.value: Value Proposition

data.name: ShortDescriptionDesc.Text
data.value: Pitch your Solution or product in a few words. Use this space to entice people to read more. Single, clear, compelling message that stated why you are different and worth getting attention. You don’t need to repeat the name as these two items will always be shown together. Example: (Solution Name) Chipsafer; (Value Proposition) Chipsafer is a unique system that allows farmers to electronically track their animals, place them in real time and collect essential vital statistics for efficient production.

data.name: Step0.Text
data.value: Start Here

data.name: Step1.Text
data.value: Problem

data.name: Step2.Text
data.value: Innovation

data.name: Step3.Text
data.value: Impact

data.name: Step4.Text
data.value: Implementation

data.name: Step5.Text
data.value: Evidence

data.name: Step6.Text
data.value: Finish

data.name: SubmissionTitle.Text
data.value: Solution Name or Product

data.name: SubmissionTitleDesc.Text
data.value: A great name is short, crisp, and easily understood. Try limiting the name to 8 words or less. Make your Solution or product stand out with a memorable name. This is the name of the product that your startup has developed. For example: Chipsafer

data.name: SupportDocuments.Text
data.value: Supporting Documents (public to the community)

data.name: SupportDocumentsDesc.Text
data.value: Upload documents, such as images, business plans, certifications, that may offer additional evidence of your Solution or product's effectiveness.

data.name: Theme.Text
data.value: Themes

data.name: ThemeDesc.Text
data.value: Themes related to the problem that your solution or product seeks to address
